document.heading: First Amendment to the Kiowa Casino Operations Authority Charter
document.text: At a duly called Session of the Legislature of the Kiowa Tribe held this 14th day of April 2018, the following Resolution and Law were adopted.

recital.text: the Legislature is vested with the authority to pass laws and resolutions pursuant to Article VI, Section 6(a) of the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe; and,
the Legislature has enacted and approved a Charter to establish and govern the Kiowa Casino Operations Authority ("KCOA") to operate and manage the Tribe's profitable gaming businesses; and,

the Legislature has determined that it is in the best interests of the Tribe to set high standards of ethics and conduct for the Members of the KCOA Board of Trustees in order to demonstrate the Tribe's commitment to operating its casinos with the highest degree of financial and business integrity and professionalism.

recital.conjunction: NOW THEREFORE IT BE IT RESOLVED;
recital.text: that the Legislature hereby enacts the attached law entitled, "First Amendment to the Kiowa Casino Operations Authority Charter".

procedural-data.heading: CERTIFICATION
procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution KL-CY-2018-012, was duly voted upon by the Kiowa Legislature on April 14, 2018, at a Regular Session XII with a vote of ( 4 ) in favor and ( 3 ) opposed, ( 0 ) abstaining, and ( 0 ) absent, pursuant to the authority vested in the Legislature by the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe.
SPONSOR: Renee M. Plata, Speaker for the Legislature
procedural-data.heading: DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION AND LAW TO THE CHAIRMAN
procedural-data.text: Resolution No. KL-CY-2018-012, was presented to the Chairman of the Kiowa Tribe on the 16th day of April, 2018, pursuant to the Article VI, Section 8(a)(iv) of the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe, and will become effective after signature by the Chairman or veto override by the Legislature, and as otherwise required by the Constitution.
[ ] VETO - RETURNED TO LEGISLATURE WITH EXPLANATION:
Presented by the Chairman to the Legislature on the __________ day of April, 2018.
procedural-data.heading: LEGISLATURE'S ACTION:
CERTIFICATION
procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution KL-CY-2018-012 was duly overridden and voted upon by the Kiowa Legislature on _______________________, 2018, at a Working Session, with a vote of _______ in favor and _______ opposed, and _________ abstaining pursuant to the authority vested in the Legislature by the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe.
